front.title: •Mara Jade's Lightsaber
front.gametext: Use 1 Force to deploy on Mara Jade. May add 1 to Force Drain where present. May target a character or creature for free. Draw two destiny. Target hit, and its forfeit = 0, if total destiny > defense value.
front.lore: As part of her training to become the Emperor's hand, Mara Jade learned from Palpatine himself how to effectively fight with a lightsaber.

pulledBy: I Will Finish What You Started
